review_title: Cheap build quality, turns on in pocket
reviews:
This flashlight isn't robust enough for a keychain. The frame of the light is cheap chrome plated plastic and the aluminum panels are just super thin and screwed into the plastic frame. My second issue with this light is the buttons aren't recessed enough and it comes on in my pocket often. I'm also not sure how it's waterproof as there are no seals between the panels and the frame, nor around the buttons.

Overall its a cheaply made light that isn't worth the price.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: This is a tiny key chain light, that weighs very little, is USB rechargeable, and has a well spaced brightness levels. This has now replaced my brass AAA key chain light, which was also very good, but much heavier, and not as bright. Takes only an hour or two to charge back up. I have only had it for about a month, but so far so good.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

review_title: Turbo mode stopped working after 5 weeks
reviews: Loved it at first but no matter what the battery charge is Turbo mode no longer comes on so you're stuck at 145 Lumens instead of 380. When I first got it, it was amazing, so disappointed. Product support for Canada seems non-existant
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: After two week use in my working place , more than 50 times on/off per day, this keychain flashlight gave very good performance. Weight is light and LED light is very bright. One full charge can last more than two days. The price is high but still worth to have it as my daily tool in my job.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

review_title: One month, 2 recharges and it's done!?!
reviews: Stopped working right after the Amazon return window past. Just over a month. Was impressed with the output for the size, but I don't use it everyday and have only had to recharge it twice and now it won't turn on at all. Not a happy customer. Should have stuck with Olight.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: it's a good product that you need on your key chain but the standby time on the battery is not that long ... gotta make sure it's charged on a daily basis

reviews: Very bright and portable. Don't let the colour name confuse you, it is not "Glacier" white it is silver. Controls are non-inutitive and holding the power button for 2 seconds before it turns on is just annoying. Other than that its good.

reviews: Awesome and small

reviews: Nice little unit, my son was happy with it. Needs a standard micro usb charger to charge it.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: The appeal of so much light from such a small keyring torch inspired me to buy one. The attraction turned into dismay when I came to use it. Firstly, the switches are fiddly and are the push down type. The various settings worked fine and the maximum 380Lm is impressive, albeit, you have to keep your finger on the switch to attain that. Later on I was to discover a design flaw with the switch configuration that could cause harm in different situations. I normally carry my keyring in my trouser pocket with other loose ends. I was driving my van when I became aware of a shocking heat against my leg that would have caused injury had I not stopped quickly. The switches had been depressed in my pocket causing the light to come on and start generating heat from the 380lm torch. Ok, so don't put it in my pocket. Problem solved. Until I came to recharge via the usb cable that didn't come with the torch. I left the torch to recharge and came back to find it switched on and very hot. I unplugged it and switched it off. It switched itself back on again and continued to do so every time I turned it off. I placed it outside on a non combustible surface until the battery was depleted. I would rather not imagine what may have happened if I hadn't noticed its peculiar behaviour. Though the idea of so much light in such a small device is appealing I would avoid this keyring torch at all costs. It is dangerous and unpredictable.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews:
Way over-priced. It doesn't come with a usb charging cable. Cannot lock on turbo; you have to keep pressing switch. Nothing to stop water getting through the switches into the electronics. The whole thing feels cheap and switches rattle around. Not as well made as other Nitecore flashlights and I have many of them. One of my favourite brands but this is not like the quality of the others.At this price it should come with a small charging adaptor and be better made, perhaps out of aluminium, rather than the cheap plastic that it appears to be made out of. To me it is worth between £5 and £10 and it feels cheap and flimsy. Some of my flashlights cost hundreds of pounds and they are worth every penny. This feels like something you could buy in a pound shop..
This has been a big disappointment from Nitecore. Many brighter, smaller and cheaper, similar flashlights that are much better value for money are available elsewhere. If this was my first experience of Nitecore I wouldn't buy that Brand again but I have about 50 of their flashlights and many of their batteries and 6 of their chargers and mostly they are all fantastic. I wonder how long the two switches on this will last...
I can only imagine that most of the reviewers here have nothing similar to compare this too.
Now dropped down to 1 star as the battery no longer holds charge for more than a few days, when switched off and locked. Having to charge it every other day, when it isn't even being used. Now using nitecore TUP and small olight which seems much better although not as small. The switches have now failed. This has never been exposed to water or damp. I opened it to see if I could fix it and the design is absolute garbage and these are all prone to fail with normal use. The switches just rest on the contacts and held in place by the cut outs on the casing. Slight expansion or contraction of internals or casing or screws seem to cause the switches to malfunction. I fixed it by squashing the internals and not tightening the screws up as tight as they were! The case does not look bent or damaged in any way.
Now it works but I am not confident in using it and know its build quality to be terrible so it is no longer being used.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: I bought this to replace a Nitcore Tip and slim down my keychain, I can’t believe how bright it is for the size we had a power cut at work and this was amazing whilst my colleagues stumbled around using their phones flashlight. Finally having to hold down the on button for a while prevents it turning on accidentally in my pocket which was a annoyance with the Tip
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: The best keyring flashlight I have ever seen. It so bright!!!
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: Very light. Very bright. Fantastic little torch.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: Powerful for its size
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: Dieses kleine Lämpchen, welches für den Schlüsselbund gedacht ist, schafft es doch tatsächlich 380 Lumen rauszuwerfen. Nochmal 20 mehr als das Nitecore Tip, welches aber doppelt so groß ist. Gefertigt aus Starkem Aluminium und sehr gut eloxiert sollte es eine weile schön bleiben. Es ist wiederaufladbar und das klappt auch super. Es hat einen ca. 300mAh Akku, was nicht viel ist, aber man hat ja Schlüsselanhängerlampen nicht zum Dauergebrauch.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: Ho avuto molte mini torce attaccate al mio portachiavi, ma questa è eccezionale. Leggerissima, piccolissima, discretamente potente (con potenza addirittura regolabile), con un sistema di accensione sicuro, per cui non si deve girare la parte superiore della minitorcia per accenderla (tenendola in tasca a volte si accende involontariamente e si trova poi la pila scarica) e ricaricabile mediante un normale cavetto usb. Vale ogni euro che costa. Sono molto contento
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

review_title: Un faro di grande potenza in pochi centimetri di grandezza.
reviews: In pochi giorni NiteCore Tini 380 lumen ha sostituito qualsiasi altra torcia in mio possesso. Piccolissima e potentissima quando occorre, può diventare un valido ausilio per la difesa personale, visto che l'accensione della massima intensità luminosa è accessibile, istantaneamente, con il tocco di un solo tasto. La durata della batteria (ricaricabile da Usb) è indicata dal lampeggio dei piccoli tasti luminosi. Per gli usi più comuni è possibile usare le potenze più basse (1 e 38 lumen) dal consumo irrisorio. Infine, riguardo all'estetica, quella realizzata in rame è semplicemente bellissima.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

review_title: Kleine Lampe mit einem kleinem Problem
reviews:
Hallo,

habe die Lampe an einer KeyChain mit meinen 2 wichtigen USB Sticks, jeden Tag auf Achse mit dabei. Die Lampe ist extrem leicht, fällt quasi gar nicht auf.

Nutzungsdauer, Helligkeitsmodi alles kein Probem. Auch die Handhabung ist absolut OK. Einziger Kritikpunkt ist dass die Farbe am Kunstoffgehäuse nich hält, dito die Farbe an den beiden Schaltern. Wenn man die Lampe täglich dabei hat, dann geht die Lackierung schnell ab. Von daher ist es eigentlich egal welche Farbe man kauft;=)

Über den USB Anschluss kann man die Lampe z.B. im Auto problemlos nachladen.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews:
Meine Einschätzung nach ein paar Tagen Gebrauch:
Die "Tini" ist interessant für Leute, die eine Mini-Lampe suchen, die so leicht ist, dass man sie täglich mitnimmt und kaum in der Hosentasche spürt, aber eine zeitlang (4h) hell genug leuchtet, um auch durch den Wald zu stapfen.
Pluspunkte:
+ kleines Gewicht u. Größe: Lt. Hersteller 13,4 g ohne Karabiner, etwa soviel wie eine 20-Cent u. 50-Cent-Münze zusammen wiegen (13,5 g)
+ Der breite Lichtkegel, der durch die Diffusoroptik erzeugt wird, ist sehr gut für den Nahbereich geeignet
+ Die Abstufung der Helligkeitsstufen (1/45/145/380 Lumen) finde ich sinnvoll. Mit 1 Lumen kann man einen Schlüssel ins Schloss bugsieren oder in einem Raum Gehen ohne gegen die Möbel zu stolpern. Mit 45 Lumen bin ich im Wald spaziert ohne über Wurzeln oder Steine zu stolpern. 380 Lumen sind so hell, dass man die "Tini" Kindern nicht zum Spielen geben sollte.
+ Die zwei Tasten haben eine gute Haptik (Druckgefühl). Die Bedienung konnte ich mir leicht einprägen.
Nachteilig oder fragwürdig:
- Die winzige Schriftgröße der mitgelieferten Bedienungsanleitung ist eine Frechheit!
- Die Kappe des Micro-USB-Ports ist mit sehr dünnem Material mit dem Gehäuse verbunden. Mal schauen wie lange das hält. (Ich weiß auch nicht, ob man es besser konstruieren könnte.)

Was mir noch aufgefallen ist:
Im Turbomodus wird die Lampe recht warm/heiß. Das Akku-Leer-Warnblinken ist auch bei ausgeschaltetem Gerät aktiv.

Bleibt zu hoffen, dass der Akku viele Ladezyklen aushält, da er fest verbaut ist.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: Perfetta per un "metto in tasca così quando ce ne è bisogno c'è"; peso ed ingombro impercettibili, ottimo mantenimento della carica, intuitiva nell'utilizzo pur mantenendo tutte le diavolerie moderne come un semplicissimo controllo del livello di carica. Buona l'idea della possibilità di utilizzo momentaneo (sino a quando si tiene premuto il tasto appropriato) del massimo della potenza luminosa disponibile e fa luce, caspita se fa luce. Buona la differenziazione tra i tre livelli di intensità ottenibili per il funzionamento costante ed altrettanto buona l'idea del leggerissimo ritardo che si ha premendo il tasto dell'accensione e che permette di ridurre la possibilità di attivarlo accidentalmente. La ricarica avviene in modo veloce; insomma un buon acquisto consigliabile a chi vuole una torcia elettrica sempre con se all'insegna di "in caso di necessità rompere il vetro" e che non necessiti di un'illuminazione di profondità; la piccolina ha una splendida luce diffusa. Bel prodotto.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews:
Seconda torcia che prendo, la prima si è rotta dopo meno di un anno, la seconda dopo un mese. La torcia sarebbe anche pratica da usare, ma purtroppo la qualità costruttiva è insufficiente. Appena la si prende in mano si ha subito la sensazione di scarsa robustezza. Non lo ritengo un prodotto affidabile, meglio rivolgersi ad altri marchi (in un altro mazzo di chiavi ho adcesempio una Mecarmy Sgn 3 ed è tutta un'altra cosa).
Ho provato anche due Nitecore Tube e anche queste hanno retto circa un anno. Non ho provato altri articoli di questo brand, ma per quanto riguarda le piccole torce da portachiavi non ci siamo proprio.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews:
Positiv:
Die Lampe leuchtet wirklich extrem hell.
Die Verarbeitung ist sauber.

Negativ:
- Das Plastik macht keinen robusten und wertigen Eindruck. Die Knöpfe ebenso wenig.
- fühlt sich wie ein <5 EURO Artikel an
- Riesiger Blister
- kein Ladekabel
- Lampe muss erst geladen werden
- Bedienung nicht selbsterklärend
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews:
Si tratta di una torcia a led, con batteria integrata e carica tramite porta usb, dalle dimensioni molto contenute: si può collegare ad un portachiavi e tenere in tasca senza disagi di sorta.

Il prezzo non è dei più contenuti, ma le specifiche giustificano a mio avviso il costo: il costruttore dichiara una potenza luminosa massima di 380 Lumens, resistenza alle cadute fino a 1,5m, e una protezione da acqua/polvere rispondente allo standard IP54.

Vi sono quattro livelli di potenza luminosa selezionabili: 1, 38, 145 e 380 Lumens. Alla potenza minima l'autonomia dichiarata è di 60 ore, che scendono a 15 minuti a quella massima.

Fortemente consigliato, in quanto può sempre tornare utile, ed è certamente più versatile del flash/torcia degli smartphone.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: Von den Funktionen der Lampe bin ich begeistert. Die maximale Helligkeit ist für diese „Größe“ beeindruckend. Auch die Akkuleistung überzeugt. Einzig die Verarbeitung der Oberfläche lässt zu wünschen übrig. Es handelt sich doch um einen Schlüsselanhänger. Dabei kommt es zwangsläufig zum Kontakt mit den Schlüsseln am Schlüsselbund. In meinem Fall ist der Lack an den Reibungsstellen nach 2 Monaten schon stark abgerieben. Auch der Chromring an der Streuscheibe hat schon Abplatzer.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

review_title: Stopped working after a few months, and interface issues
reviews:
Broke after a few months usage (would still illuminate, but only at ~1 lumen, so essentially useless). When it worked, it was exceptionally bright and it's as tiny as its name would lead you to believe, so I guess that's something ... but not much use if it doesn't last. This is the second nitecore light that I've had break on me, and I'm very careful with my gear -- I'm not impressed.

Even if it hadn't broken, though, I'd still not be using it. The user interface (particularly the two-second long press to turn on) is horrible. By way of comparison, the nitecore tube isn't super-bright, but it's a heck of a lot more useful because it actually turns on when you click the button (crazy idea, I know, right?)
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

review_title: Molto luminosa, leggera, piccola e ben fatta.
reviews:
Costa molto per essere una torcia da portachiavi ma surclassa qualunque cellulare, alla massima luminosità illumina una piccola stanza da sola!
Nelle foto si vede questa torcia confrontata con una concorrente più economica: in una stanza completamente buia riescono entrambe a illuminare bene il televisore... questa qui è quella con il riflesso più grande sullo schermo della tv --- ha un raggio meno concentrato rispetto all'altra, ma illumina di più, pur non essendo impostata al massimo.
Segnalo che ha due modalità di funzionamento, una in cui una volta accesa resta accesa finquando non si preme nuovamente il tasto di accensione e l'altra in cui lo spegnimento è temporizzato e avviene automaticamente. Io preferisco la prima modalità, comunque il manuale spiega bene come passare dall'una all'altra.
Sono soddisfatto e la raccomando.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

review_title: Si riga troppo facilmente nel portachiavi
reviews: Come funzionamento darei anche quattro stelle abbondanti, perché nonostante le ridotte dimensioni fa una bella luce, facilmente regolabile, ed è un prodotto solido e leggero. L'unica grave pecca, già riscontrata in altre torce portachiavi della Nitecore, è che la verniciatura è così leggera che si è subito rigata pesantemente. Così, tanto era bella appena acquistata quella finitura color rame, tanto è sgradevole ora così rigata.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

review_title: Tanta luce in un oggetto così piccolo!
reviews: E incredibile come un oggetto così piccolo faccia tanta luce, che dire non posso più farne a meno! e costruito bene ottimi materiali e leggero!
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: Sono rimasto favorevolmente stupito da quanto è piccola e potente, la versione che ho comprato io è quella in metallo (rame). Si ricarica velocemente, è piccolissima (attenti a non perderla), fa molta luce, questa versione in rame è bellissima, sono contento dell’acquisto fatto e ovviamente la consiglio. Logistica Amazon perfetta.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: Diese Lampe ist gigantisch hell und lässt sich super bedienen. Wirklich beeindruckend was aus dieser Lampe für ein Licht raus kommt. reviews:
Das ist die beste Minitaschenlampe, die ich je hatte! Öfter höre ich im Halbdunkeln:" Andreas, kannst Du mal Licht machen?"
Sehr empfehlenswert!

product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: The Nitecore TINI Cu is probably my favorite pocket light because of the intuitive UI and one button turbo access which at 380 lumens is no joke, it's smaller than you'd expect, no, smaller, but it still has a quality feeling weight, indicating the light is dense with technology. The copper frame will patina nicely like an older penny and can be shined extremely quickly with ordinary tomato ketchup if you like to keep yours looking new or want to reset your patina, the rubber cap on the micro usb charging port is microscopic and you'll probably worry about it but it stays well seated and I'm no longer expecting it to fall off. The fact that Nitecore managed to fit a rechargeable flashlight putting out 380 lumens into a package the size of a micro machines toy is just incredible, I strongly recommend it.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: I like its size and that it is very bright. I like that it is an atypical shape. I like that it is cute as a button. I do not like a two second delay to "power up" every time you want it on. I do not like that a rechargeable light does not come with a cord to recharge it. I am glad I got it, but I would not advise anyone but a flashlight freak to buy it.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews:
I purchased this and the MechArmy SG3 right around the same time. The SG3 is quite versatile with the red and UV LEDs. If you have kids and pets... be prepared for terrifying blacklit carpets. I have often clipped it to my hat brim as backup headlamp and use mostly on evening dog walks. It feels quite solid and seems to have better runtime.
The TINI is of course smaller and winds up being the one I use more often. I prefer its controls since it remembers last light level when you turn it back on. TINI also has a lower 'dim' setting so I am not worried about using it in the bedroom after significant other is already asleep. Using it mostly in the mornings getting ready for work before sun is up and finding stuff in dark areas like car,closet, backpack but it still has that bright setting to light up the outdoors too. Only bad thing is that with it being so small, I need to keep it secured in one place in my backpack or I
have to go searching for it when I need it. I'd recommend either one.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: This light is so much smaller than I had expected! I mean that in a good way. It’s also incredibly bright; more than adequate for nearly any situation. I got the copper version. It’s very handsome; smooth and bright, matte not polished. I’m very picky about what’s in my keys, as I hate having things in my pocket, so I couldn’t handle something bulky. This doesn’t add much at all, and is plenty comfortable in my pocket.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: This is an easy review because it is great for what it is. It’s small, lightweight, super brite for its size, easy and intuitive to operate, easy to charge and the copper develops a very cool patina. I don’t have much more to say. It’s pretty awesome. I own several high end flashlights and this one gets the most use because it’s always there. I think that is the best feature of this little guy.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews:
Bought this for an Xmas gift but tried it out before sending it on its way (friend asked me to get them a good light, wanted to verify quality). This light is pretty much exactly what it bills it’s self as: tiny and very bright.

I have and use a lot of EDC flashlights. My go to is a solid brass110 lumen lumintop aaa that I wear as a necklace which till now was by far the best light I’ve found. By comparison I can’t say this light is 3-4 times brighter (it’s at least a bit brighter and seems comparable to an old multi D mag lite) but it is about 1/3 the weight and half the size. I knocked a star off because it feels just a bit cheaply made (though that may just be in my head coming from my current light), doesn’t seem quite as bright as advertised (though again I could only measure by rough comparison), and I’m just not a fan of the way the buttons work (they aren’t bad just not stellar). All in all I’m very likely to buy one of these as a backpacking light for myself very soon.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

review_title: One of the best Keychain Flashlights
reviews:
While there are smaller lights, many of them top out at around 150 lumens and may leave you wanting more. There are larger keychain lights that put out up to 1000 lumens, but that is probably more light than you generally need from a keychain light and they tend to be on the bulky side (key fob size).

This light hits an ideal midpoint in size and lumens. Small enough to almost disappear in pocket with more than enough lumens to light the way in the dark. The 2 second press turning the light on is a bit of a bummer. It would be nice to have the option to remove it, but it's a minor annoyance
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews:
I have had a Tini in aluminum for a couple or years, and it works perfectly and is very well-built.
I bought the copper version only because the alu one is so light it is almost like a toy. The copper works identically, but feels more like a serious tool.
Alu is about 13 grams, copper is around 26g - about twice the weight.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: I bought this for my daughter while she is away at FSU. She carries it on her key chain and says it is crazy bright. She feels safer with a light to walk around campus at night. Its so bright (3 settings) she can temporarily blind someone at night if need be.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

review_title: It is as bright as they say. Great light so far.
reviews: Recharges easily, I don't know how long the little rubber socket cover will last but so far so good. If you need a charging cord buy one that states cord included. I would buy this again. I have not found the light to get hot but maybe at 360 lumens for the 15 minutes it will run at that output it might but so do Surefire flashlights.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: This little light is a wonder! It fits nicely on my keychain and I hardly notice it in my pocket. As far as the light functionality, it's pretty awesome! The turbo mode is absolutely impressive. The battery run times are great, even when in high mode. I highly recommend this little edc light.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: Great flashlight - I own a few flashlights with my biggest one boating 2500 lumens. This is a super bright and super small little light. It’s pretty amazing how bright it is for the size. It’s nice that it has the micro usb charger. Sometimes the light turns on in my pocket.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: Great light but it didn't come with a charging cord. Ordered two this time and waiting for the second one to arrive to see if I have the same problem. I ordered one awhile back and I received the charging cord with it. No good without a charging cord.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: Showed unacceptable amount of wear within one week on buttons. Chrome flaked off. This kind of light has to ride with keys in the bottom of a pocket and survive. I did not feel confident it would do that long-term. The rovyvon a4 is a better light that costs twice as much, but is 650 lumens, titanium case and tougher.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: Wow very very bright! Used it today to find a network jack in back of server in a server room was not very well lit. I wish it had a flash mode. Very tiny and hardly notice it my key ring. Love how tiny and bright it is.
product_name: NITECORE TINI 380 Lm Super Small USB Rechargeable LED Keychain Flashlight

reviews: The smallest, lightest, and brightest for it's size. It's quite light so maybe opt for the steel version if you'd want a little more heft. reviews: I bought this light for a girl who is a friend/co worker who asked me to buy her a knife. She's left handed so I'm getting her a Spyderco Dragonfly 2 in zdp-189. I had the tini in my pocket for two days because she had two days off and I really liked it. She likes purple so I bought this one but it is equally green as well as gold. I wish I put it to more use but it was a fun fidget toy. I was already planning to buy my self an acebeam uc15 but not I am also going to get myself a copper tini. Worth it!
